text: Hey Christopher - I would suggest integrating with the v3 API for any new projects. Do you have an idea of which endpoints your application would end up needing? Maybe something like: create list, add objects to list, read objects?

that sounds about right, some of our lists are quite dynamic (albeit not using dynamic lists since the update/management of said lists will be done on our side alongside creating the contacts prior to list creation)
• create list (which i understand y'all will roll out in Q4 at some point)
• add contacts to list
• read list (preferably be able to see the different email campaigns a list is attached to and if this list is being used in other lists)
• update list membership (i.e. cross reference our lists for deltas between which contacts are in a list)

Awesome, sounds good.
